info.title: TESTING SPECTRAL RULES - DO NOT MERGE--
info.description:
>ℹ️ Check the new [Payments onboarding guide](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/docs/payments-overview). We created this guide to improve the onboarding experience for developers at VTEX. It assembles all documentation on our Developer Portal about Payments and is organized by focusing on the developer's journey.

The Gift Card Hub API allows interactions with all Gift Card providers registered to a store from a single point.

Gift Card providers are systems capable of providing cards to be used in the buying process.

The following is the sequence diagram that represents calls in the purchase closing process.
![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/vtexdocs/dev-portal-content@main/images/gift-card-integration-guide-provider-protocol-0.png)

**Checkout + Gateway**: Systems responsible for the sale and for processing orders and payments.

**Gift Card Hub**: System responsible for managing multiple registered Gift Card providers for a store.

**Gift Card Provider**: System responsible for providing the Gift Cards available to the user not closing a purchase. This system can be implemented by third parties.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

get.description: Returns a collection of giftcard providers from a store.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json.

parameters.name: REST-Range
parameters.description: Pagination control. This query variable must follow the format _resources={from}-{to}_.

preAuthEnabled.description: Related to the pre-authorization that can happen on the transaction generated through the provider.

cancelEnabled.description: It says if it is possible to cancel the transaction, generated through the provider.

_self.description: It is an object that carries an auto reference from the provider at the Hub (on its API).

href.description: This is one of the fields inside the `_self`. It is exactly the route that identifies this provider on the Hub's API, but it is not the same thing as the `serviceURL`.

appKey.description: Credential provided by the merchant that VTEX will use for identification.

appToken.description: Credential provided by the merchant that VTEX will use for identification.

relationName.description: Represents the relationship between the client and the store.

emissionDate.description: Giftcard emission date. It must be in the format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.fff` (ISO 8601 format).

expiringDate.description: Giftcard expiration date. It must be in the format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.fff` (ISO 8601 format).

caption.description: Field to be filled in if a loyalty program must be created for the Giftcard.

restrictedToOwner.description: The Giftcard can only be used for a specified client's ID.

multipleRedemptions.description: The Giftcard can be used to make new purchases until its value is completely used.

multipleCredits.description: The Giftcard balance can be changed.

document.description: Document number informed by the customer.

relationName.description: Represents the relationship between the client and the store.

id.description: The ID of the SKU in VTEX platform.
